languages.text: {n}Процессия, встречающая вас, не слишком велика, но заметна. Все разодеты в лучшую одежду, каждая пуговица сверкает. Стоящая впереди высокая женщина с явно дорогими {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}имплантами{/g} приседает в церемонном реверансе.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}Вольный Торговец{/d}! Футфол приветствует вас! От лица Наместника, господина Владайма Токары, позвольте выразить радость по случаю вашего прибытия. Наместник ожидает вас в резиденции, но если у вас есть иные дела на станции — я с радостью сопровожу вас!"

{n}The welcome procession is not particularly long, but it does attract attention. Everyone is dressed in their finest apparel, every button gleaming. Standing in front of the others is a woman with clearly expensive {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g}. She bows in a solemn curtsy.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}Rogue Trader{/d}! Footfall welcomes you! On behalf of the Liege, Lord Vladaym Tocara, allow me to express my joy at your arrival. The Liege awaits you at his residence, but should you have other business to conduct on the station, I will be honoured to serve as your guide!"
languages.original_text: {n}Процессия, встречающая вас, не слишком велика, но заметна. Все разодеты в лучшую одежду, каждая пуговица сверкает. Стоящая впереди высокая женщина с явно дорогими {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}имплантами{/g} приседает в церемонном реверансе.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}Вольный Торговец{/d}! Футфол приветствует вас! От лица Наместника, господина Владайма Токары, позвольте выразить радость по случаю вашего прибытия. Наместник ожидает вас в резиденции, но если у вас есть иные дела на станции — я с радостью сопровожу вас!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The welcoming procession is not particularly long, but it does attract attention. Everyone is dressed their best, every button is shining. Standing in front of the others is a woman with clearly expensive implants. She bows in a ceremonious curtsy.{/n} "Rogue Trader! Footfall welcomes you! On behalf of the Liege, Lord Vladaym Tocara, allow me to express my joy at your arrival. The Liege awaits you at his residence, but were you to have other business to conduct on the station, I would be glad to serve as your guide!"

The Liege awaits you at his residence, but were you to have other business to conduct on the station, I would be glad to serve as your guide!"

languages.text: {n}歓迎の行進は特に長いわけではないが、人目を惹く。誰もが最高級の服に身を包み、ボタンひとつひとつが輝いている。先頭には明らかに高価な{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}インプラント{/g}を装着した女性が立っている。彼女はおごそかに頭を下げた。{/n}「{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}自由開拓者{/d}！フットフォールはあなたを歓迎します！領主であるヴラダイム・トカラ卿に代わり、ご到着を喜び申し上げます。領主は邸宅でお待ち申し上げておりますが、ステーションで他に用事がおありでしたら、喜んで私が案内役を務めさせていただきます！」
languages.original_text: {n}The welcome procession is not particularly long, but it does attract attention. Everyone is dressed in their finest apparel, every button gleaming. Standing in front of the others is a woman with clearly expensive {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g}. She bows in a solemn curtsy.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}Rogue Trader{/d}! Footfall welcomes you! On behalf of the Liege, Lord Vladaym Tocara, allow me to express my joy at your arrival. The Liege awaits you at his residence, but should you have other business to conduct on the station, I will be honoured to serve as your guide!"

traits.locale_text: {n}歓迎の行進は特に長いわけではないが、人目を惹く。誰もが最高級の服に身を包み、ボタンひとつひとつが輝いている。先頭には明らかに高価な{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}インプラント{/g}を装着した女性が立っている。彼女はおごそかに頭を下げた。{/n}「{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}自由開拓者{/d}！フットフォールはあなたを歓迎します！領主であるヴラダイム・トカラ卿に代わり、ご到着を喜び申し上げます。領主は邸宅でお待ち申し上げておりますが、ステーションで他に用事がおありでしたら、喜んで私が案内役を務めさせていただきます！」

languages.text: {n}迎接队伍不是很长，但相当惹眼。每个人都穿着华美的衣服，每颗纽扣都在闪闪发光。站在最前面的，是一位带着显贵的{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}的女人，她庄重地行礼鞠躬。{/n}“{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}行商浪人{/d}！落脚港欢迎您！请允许我代表总督，弗拉迪姆·托卡拉大人，对您的到来表示喜悦。总督在他的官邸等待您的接见，如果您在星站上还有其他要事，我很荣幸为您当向导！”
languages.original_text: {n}The welcome procession is not particularly long, but it does attract attention. Everyone is dressed in their finest apparel, every button gleaming. Standing in front of the others is a woman with clearly expensive {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g}. She bows in a solemn curtsy.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}Rogue Trader{/d}! Footfall welcomes you! On behalf of the Liege, Lord Vladaym Tocara, allow me to express my joy at your arrival. The Liege awaits you at his residence, but should you have other business to conduct on the station, I will be honoured to serve as your guide!"

traits.locale_text: {n}迎接队伍不是很长，但相当惹眼。每个人都穿着华美的衣服，每颗纽扣都在闪闪发光。站在最前面的，是一位带着显贵的{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}的女人，她庄重地行礼鞠躬。{/n}“行商浪人！落脚港欢迎您！请允许我代表总督，弗拉迪姆·托卡拉大人，对您的到来表示喜悦。总督在他的官邸等待您的接见，如果您在星站上还有其他要事，我很荣幸为您当向导！”

languages.text: {n}El cortejo de bienvenida no es precisamente largo, pero sí que llama la atención. Todo el mundo va ataviado con sus mejores galas y cada botón reluce impoluto. Liderando la comitiva se encuentra una mujer que luce unos {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implantes{/g} visiblemente caros. Te dedica una reverencia solemne.{/n} «¡{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}Comerciante Independiente{/d}! ¡Paso le da la bienvenida! En nombre del Señor, lord Vladaym Tocara, permítame expresar mi contento por su llegada. El Señor {mf|le|la} aguarda en su residencia, pero, si tiene otro asunto pendiente en la estación, ¡me complacería servirle de guía!».
languages.original_text: {n}The welcome procession is not particularly long, but it does attract attention. Everyone is dressed in their finest apparel, every button gleaming. Standing in front of the others is a woman with clearly expensive {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g}. She bows in a solemn curtsy.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}Rogue Trader{/d}! Footfall welcomes you! On behalf of the Liege, Lord Vladaym Tocara, allow me to express my joy at your arrival. The Liege awaits you at his residence, but should you have other business to conduct on the station, I will be honoured to serve as your guide!"

traits.locale_text: {n}El cortejo de bienvenida no es precisamente largo, pero sí que llama la atención. Todo el mundo va ataviado con sus mejores galas y cada botón reluce impoluto. Liderando la comitiva se encuentra una mujer que luce unos {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implantes{/g} visiblemente caros. Te dedica una reverencia solemne.{/n} «¡Comerciante Independiente! ¡Paso le da la bienvenida! En nombre del Señor, lord Vladaym Tocara, permítame expresar mi contento por su llegada. El Señor {mf|le|la} aguarda en su residencia, pero, si tiene otro asunto pendiente en la estación, ¡me complacería servirle de guía!».

languages.text: {n}La procession d'accueil n'est pas bien longue, mais elle est au centre de l'attention. Tout le monde a revêtu ses plus beaux vêtements, sur lesquels chaque bouton rutile. Debout devant le reste de l'assemblée, une femme aux {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} de valeur s'incline pour vous faire la révérence.{/n} « {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}Libre-{mf|marchand|marchande}{/d} ! Castel vous souhaite la bienvenue ! Au nom de notre suzerain, le seigneur Vladaym Tocara, laissez-moi vous dire à quel point votre arrivée nous remplit de joie. Le suzerain vous attend dans sa résidence, mais si vous avez d'autres choses à voir dans la station, ce serait un honneur pour moi de vous servir de guide ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The welcome procession is not particularly long, but it does attract attention. Everyone is dressed in their finest apparel, every button gleaming. Standing in front of the others is a woman with clearly expensive {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g}. She bows in a solemn curtsy.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}Rogue Trader{/d}! Footfall welcomes you! On behalf of the Liege, Lord Vladaym Tocara, allow me to express my joy at your arrival. The Liege awaits you at his residence, but should you have other business to conduct on the station, I will be honoured to serve as your guide!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La procession d'accueil n'est pas bien longue, mais elle est au centre de l'attention. Tout le monde a revêtu ses plus beaux vêtements, sur lesquels chaque bouton rutile. Debout devant le reste de l'assemblée, une femme aux {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} de valeur s'incline pour vous faire la révérence.{/n} « Libre-{mf|marchand|marchande} ! Castel vous souhaite la bienvenue ! Au nom de notre suzerain, le seigneur Vladaym Tocara, laissez-moi vous dire à quel point votre arrivée nous remplit de joie. Le suzerain vous attend dans sa résidence, mais si vous avez d'autres choses à voir dans la station, ce serait un honneur pour moi de vous servir de guide ! »

languages.text: {n}Die Willkommensprozession ist nicht sonderlich lang, erregt aber durchaus Aufmerksamkeit. Alle tragen ihre schönste Kleidung, jeder Knopf glänzt. Vor allen anderen steht eine Frau mit offensichtlich teuren {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Implantaten{/g}. Sie macht einen formvollendeten Knicks.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}{/d}! Footfall heißt Euch willkommen! Im Namen des Lehnsherren, Lord Vladaym Tocara, möchte ich meine große Freude über Eure Ankunft zum Ausdruck bringen. Der Lehnsherr erwartet Euch in seiner Residenz, aber solltet Ihr andere Angelegenheiten auf der Station erledigen müssen, wäre es mir eine Ehre, Euch herumzuführen!"
languages.original_text: {n}The welcome procession is not particularly long, but it does attract attention. Everyone is dressed in their finest apparel, every button gleaming. Standing in front of the others is a woman with clearly expensive {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g}. She bows in a solemn curtsy.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}Rogue Trader{/d}! Footfall welcomes you! On behalf of the Liege, Lord Vladaym Tocara, allow me to express my joy at your arrival. The Liege awaits you at his residence, but should you have other business to conduct on the station, I will be honoured to serve as your guide!"

Vor allen anderen steht eine Frau mit offensichtlich teuren {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Implantaten{/g}. Sie macht einen formvollendeten Knicks.{/n} "{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}! Footfall heißt Euch willkommen! Im Namen des Lehnsherren, Lord Vladaym Tocara, möchte ich meine große Freude über Eure Ankunft zum Ausdruck bringen. Der Lehnsherr erwartet Euch in seiner Residenz, aber solltet Ihr andere Angelegenheiten auf der Station erledigen müssen, wäre es mir eine Ehre, Euch herumzuführen!"

languages.text: {n}Karşılama alayı çok uzun sayılmasa da dikkat çektiği kesin. Herkes en güzel kıyafetlerini giymiş ve bütün düğmeler parlatılmış. {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}İmplantlarının{/g} çok pahalı olduğu belli olan, diğerlerinin önünde duran bir kadın resmî bir reverans yaparak eğiliyor.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}Hür Tacir{/d}! Binliman size hoş geldiniz der! Emîrimiz Lord Vladaym Tocara adına, gelişinizden duyduğum mutluluğu ifade etmeme izin verin. Emîr sizi konağında beklemekte lakin istasyonda ilgilenmeyi planladığınız başka işleriniz varsa size rehberlik etmekten şeref duyarım!"
languages.original_text: {n}The welcome procession is not particularly long, but it does attract attention. Everyone is dressed in their finest apparel, every button gleaming. Standing in front of the others is a woman with clearly expensive {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g}. She bows in a solemn curtsy.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}Rogue Trader{/d}! Footfall welcomes you! On behalf of the Liege, Lord Vladaym Tocara, allow me to express my joy at your arrival. The Liege awaits you at his residence, but should you have other business to conduct on the station, I will be honoured to serve as your guide!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Karşılama alayı çok uzun olmasa da ilgi topladığı kesin. Herkes en güzel kıyafetlerini giymiş ve bütün düğmeler parlatılmış. {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}İmplant{/g}larının çok pahalı olduğu belli olan, diğerlerinin önünde duran bir kadın resmî bir reverans yaparak eğiliyor.{/n} "Hür Tacir! Binliman size hoş geldiniz diyor! Emîr Lord Vladaym Tocara adına gelişiniz için duyduğum mutluluğu ifade etmeme izin verin. Emîr sizi konağında beklemekte ancak eğer istasyonda ilgilenmeyi planladığınız başka işleriniz varsa size rehberlik etmekten onur duyarım!"
